name: places/ChIJ5YNCiVJZwokRZYnf9yYciBg
adrFormatAddress: 2091 Broadway, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
I paid $180 for a poor-quality nail extension. It didn't last long, only for 4 days, and the finishing was terrible.

It's a shame because the place is nice, but the materials they're using are terrible. Unfortunately, I guess the lady who worked with me, even though she was polite, doesn't have much experience.

I went to another place nearby to have it fixed, and what a difference in quality.

originalText.text:
Beauty Box is the best saloon I have ever been to. I recommend their full range of services to everyone who asks!

Every staff member is professional, friendly and super helpful. Their attention to detail is incredible, they will do anything to ensure the outcome of your chosen service is phenomenal. The saloon itself is extremely clean and organized.

I am shocked to read some of these negative reviews, they are unfounded. I will never go anywhere else!

text.text:

I am shocked to read some of these negative reviews, they are unfounded. I will never go anywhere else!

originalText.text: This place is wonderful! I have never walked out of a nail salon so happy and relaxed. My technician, Sue, was delightful and did an amazing job on my UV gel nails. She was so careful and gentle, and they look absolutely perfect! The setting is soothing, quiet, and luxurious, everyone is very friendly, and there were all sorts of extra touches, extra lotion, hand and arm massage, cuticle care, that made the slightly higher cost than some spots absolutely worth it. (there’s a cash-pay discount that also helps.) On top of that, there is a roving massage therapist who I engaged for a shoulder massage while I was getting my nails done - heaven! I came out with better posture! And feeling like I’d had a therapy session. Will definitely see them again!

originalText.text: I never write reviews but Beauty Box saved my day! Had a horrible experience at a different place nearby and came here to see if they could fit me in to finish the job. They were very kind and able to fit me in within a half hour. The place is so clean and nice and everyone was wonderful. Allie did a great job with my dip manicure and was super sweet - they don’t have a ton of dip colors but I was very happy with my choice. Beauty Box will be my new go-to - the money is absolutely worth it.

originalText.text: I have been coming to Beauty Box religiously for the past  year or so. It continues to be - hands down - the greatest experience. Annie is the BEST manicurist I have ever had - she is detail oriented, meticulous, patient, kind & most importantly consistent. I have not gone anywhere else since I first came to Annie, and never would. I genuinely leave every appointment happier than when I walked in. The entire staff is so professional, and the salon is immaculate. I also frequently get 10 minute back massages while getting my manicures, and they are always unbelievable. Could not recommend this place - or Annie - more. She consistently makes my nails look perfect.
